audioText: Je doutais sérieusement de la véracité de ses explications contradictoires hier soir.
question: What was I seriously doubting last night?
options: The truthfulness of his contradictory explanations
The accuracy of my personal observations
The reliability of the weather forecast
The quality of the evening entertainment
explanation: The text states 'Je doutais sérieusement de la véracité de ses explications contradictoires hier soir' - I was seriously doubting the truthfulness of his contradictory explanations last night. The verb 'doutais' (was doubting - imperfect) with adverb 'sérieusement' (seriously) describes past skepticism.
